description: This service will cancel a Goods Delivery Ticket in Draft, In Progress or Open Status                  with no Goods Delivery Runs created
This service will cancel a Goods Delivery Group in Draft status
This service will close a Goods Delivery Ticket where Ticket status is Open' or 'Awaiting                  Review and all runs are not "Out for Delivery"
This service will close a Goods Delivery Group where the Group has an Out for Delivery                  Status
This service operation will get Capture Goods Delivery Runs for the specified criteria.

This service operation will get Goods Delivery Tickets for the specified criteria.

Returns Inventory Count Sheet Print Layouts by Reference ID, or Company, or Custom                  Business Form Layout. Returns all Inventory Count Sheet Print Layouts if no Reference                  ID or criteria is provided.
Returns Inventory Count Sheets matching the request criteria

This is the Get web service for Inventory Return Orders.
To get inventory shipment instance via webservice, user can pass id of inventory shipment                  as parameter.

This service operation will get Inventory Stock Request for the specified criteria.                                                      The request criteria can be for a single Inventory Stock Request based on Reference                  or multiple Inventory Stock Requests based on search criteria.
This service operation retrieves the Inventory Storage Location.
Get Inventory Transactions web service to allow users to fetch Inventory Transaction                  instance using WID and Request Criteria

This service operation will get Item Lots for the specified criteria. Item Lot Data                  includes Lot Identifier, Purchase Item, Manufacturer, Lot Manufacture Date, lot Expiration                  Date, Lot Status and Lot Memo.. The request criteria can be for a single item lot                  based on Reference, or all item lots can be retrieved if no criteria is specified.
Web service task to retrieve Manufacturer instances

This service operation gets recalls for the specified criteria.                  The request criteria can be for a single recall based on a reference ID or multiple                  recalls based on search criteria.

Retrieves details about a recall reaction when you specify a Reaction ID. Retrieves                  all recall reactions associated with a recall when you provide a Recall ID. Workday                  only retrieve reactions with a status of Approved, Canceled, Closed, Denied, Draft,                  and In Progress.

Web Service operation to Put Company Inventory Accounting Options.  The operation                  does not support creating new instances of Company object and allows only updates.                  'Add Only' flag is also not supported.                  Because operation works only for update of existing Company instances, the Put operation                  requires either Company Reference or Company ID to be specified.  If both reference                  and ID are specified, the reference would take precedence for instance resolution.
This web service operation is used to insert / update Custom Barcode Types.

This service operation will add or update Item Lots. Item Lot Data includes Lot Identifier,                  Purchase Item, Manufacturer, Lot Manufacture Date, lot Expiration Date,  Lot Status                  and Lot Memo.
Web service for creating or editing manufacturer instances.
This service operation will create Ad Hoc Goods Delivery and it's Goods Delivery Lines                  and submit it to the Goods Delivery business process
This web service will submit an Ad Hoc Count Inventory to the Business Process.
Ad Hoc Put-Away web service for inventory.
This service operation will capture goods delivery run and submit it to the Goods                  Delivery Run business process.
This service operation will create change purchase Item spend category request and                  submits them to the  Change Spend Category request business process.
This web service will submit Count Inventory to the Business Process.
This Service Operation will Create Inventory Ad Hoc Par Count for a Par Location and                  submit it to the Inventory Par Count Business Process.
This service operation will adjust inventory quantity within an inventory location                  and submit it to the Adjust Inventory business process.
This service operation will adjust inventory quantity within an inventory location                  for inventory return orders and submit it to the Adjust Inventory business process.
Submit Inventory Cost Adjustment transaction
This service operation will pick inventory for a Directed Pick List and submit it                  to the Pick Inventory business process.
This service operation will move inventory from one inventory location to another                  and submit it to the Move Inventory business process.
This Service Operation will Create Inventory Par Count for a Par Location and submit                  it to the Inventory Par Count Business Process.
This Service Operation will remove par inventory from a Par Location and submit it                  to the Inventory Par Removal Business Process.
This service operation will pick inventory and submit it to the Pick Inventory business                  process.
This service operation will issue out inventory and submit it to the Quick Issue Inventory                  business process.
Submit an Inventory Return Order via web service and initiate the BP.
Create inventory shipment and its business process via web service operation
This service operation will create Inventory Stock Request and it's Stock Request                  Lines and submit it to the Inventory Stock Request business process.

This service operation will convert quantity from one uom to another, optionally move                  it from one inventory location to another, and submit it to the Move Inventory business                  process.
This service operation will manage goods delivery runs.  Creating or managing a Group,                  setting Assign-To and Out for Delivery boolean
Submit put away transaction based on a Receipt,  Shipment, or Inventory Return.
This service operation creates a recall and its recall lines and submits them to the                  Recall business process.
Creates or updates a recall reaction with recall company details. Requires an approved                  or open reaction. Uses the Recall Reaction business process.
Creates or updates an ad hoc Recall Response. Uses the Recall Response Event business                  process.
This service operation will unreserve inventory.
